Geoinformatics for Food, Energy, and Water (GeoFEW) Lab

  • Geoinformatics for Food, Energy, and Water (GeoFEW) Lab
  • ruopu.li@siu.edu
  • liverpoo
  • liruopu

My research centers on the Food-Energy-Water (FEW) Informatics. My specific research topics, including GIS Analysis and Modeling, Water Resources Modeling and Management, Energy Geography, and Agricultural Land Use. My research also extends to the social dimensions of natural resources development.
